```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

library(targets)

`%>%` <- magrittr::`%>%`

load_template <- function(
    path,
    ...
) {
    path %>% 
        knitr::knit_expand(...) %>% 
        knitr::knit_child(text = ., quiet = TRUE) %>% 
        cat(sep = "\n")
}
```
